body: The eidolon looks like a serpent with wings, such as a couatl or lillend.
name: Winged Snake
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Eidolon Models/Winged Snake

sections.body: (couatl), 26 points (lillend): Base Form serpentine; Primary Evolutions basic magic (any), grab; Secondary Evolutions couatl (constrict, flight, large, magic attacks, major magic [invisibility], minor magic [detect chaos/evil/good/law], poison, ultimate magic [gaseous form]); lillend (constrict, flight, immunity [electricity], large, limbs [arms], magic attacks, major magic [darkness or invisibility], minor magic [cure light wounds], resistance [cold, fire], skilled [Perform], weapon training [martial]).
sections.name: 23 points
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Eidolon Models/Winged Snake/23 points
